formatDescription: Wordstar 2000 is a version of the Wordstar word proccessor application that was popular in the early to mid 1980s and was created by MicroPro. Wordstar 2000 files are likely to lack a file extension.
provenanceCompoundName: National Library of New Zealand / National Library of New Zealand
formatProvenance: Signature supplied by Jay Gattuso of the National Library of New Zealand. 08/2023 (v.113)- Max offset sequence expanded by 2 bytes. Submitted by the National Library of New Zealand.
